org.omancode.r.types

Class REXPAttr

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.omancode.r.types.REXPAttr

  • public final class REXPAttr
extends Object
    Static utility class for getting attributes of REXPs.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Method Detail

      • getClassAttribute

        public static String getClassAttribute(REXP rexp)
        Returns the R class attribute of rexp.
        Parameters:
        rexp - expression to test
        Returns:
        a comma separated string of the rexp classes, eg: "[xtabs, table]". If it has no class attribute, returns the name of the java class instead (eg: REXPDouble).

      • getNamesAttribute

        public static String[] getNamesAttribute(REXP rexp)
                                  throws RFaceException
        Get the names attribute of rexp. Like the R function names, this will return dimnames[[1]] for a one-dimensional array.
        Parameters:
        rexp - r expression
        Returns:
        names attribute
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem determining dimnames attribute.

      • getDimensions

        public static int getDimensions(REXP rexp)
        Get dimension (dim) attribute from rexp.
        Parameters:
        rexp - rexp
        Returns:
        number of dimensions

      • getNamesDimNames

        public static String[] getNamesDimNames(REXP rexp)
        Return the names attribute of the dimnames attribute.
        Parameters:
        rexp - rexp
        Returns:
        names of dimnames, or null if there is no names attribute.

      • getDimNames

        public static String[][] getDimNames(REXP rexp)
                              throws RFaceException
        Return the dimnames attribute.
        Parameters:
        rexp - rexp
        Returns:
        dimnamesor null if there is no dimnames attribute.
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem determining dimnames attribute.
